Name: Facebook Clone
description: This HTML and CSS project replicates Facebook's interface, including a navigation bar, user profiles, stories, posts, and a sidebar with various options, focusing purely on design and layout.

Name: Food Ordering Platform
description: This webpage is a simple Zomato clone created using HTML and CSS, featuring a navbar, search bar, dining sections, restaurant collections, and a footer with links and social media icons.

Name: Urban Clap
description: This HTML page is for Urban Company, including a navigation bar, a main section with home services and promotional cards, and a footer with company details and social media links.

Name: single page website
description: This HTML document features a top navigation bar, a hero section with a video icon, and sections for showcasing features, strategies, and partner logos. It uses Bootstrap for styling and responsiveness.
